entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dawson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Dawson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:11 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -44.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Airport 2:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -44.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Dewpoint: -49.0°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 46.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Ice fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 46. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 39 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending before morning then cloudy. Ice fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 39 by morning. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 41. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
